items.title: Saylor’s Blueprint: Bitcoin as Digital Capital, Corporate Strategy and Long-Term Outperformance
items.excerpt: Michael Saylor’s plan reframes Bitcoin as a form of corporate capital and anchors Strategy’s public identity to a concentrated crypto stake, setting the company apart from traditional technology and financial peers. The thesis mixes an ambitious forecast of long-term outperformance with proposals to make Bitcoin usable as collateral, while facing volatility,
